Content:: The Black Duke (Italian: Il duca nero) is a 1963 Italian historical adventure film directed by Pino Mercanti.[1] The domain of the cruel Cesare Borgia is opposed by Caterina Sforza, who gives the assignment to the beautiful Geneva to assassinate him. But Geneva and Cesare fall in love. This article related to an Italian film of the 1960s is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This article about an adventure film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
